items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
items.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

items.content_html: SysView Info API is a lightweight Node.js application that provides system statistics through simple JSON routes. It allows you to access information about your system's CPU, memory, user, process, network, and operating system.
items.title: cezary-klauza/SysView-Info-API: SysView Info API is a lightweight Node.js application that provides system statistics through simple JSON routes. It allows you to access information about your system's CPU, memory, user, process, network, and operating system.

items.content_html: InStock is a lightweight and efficient web-based inventory management application designed for small and medium businesses, retail stores, supermarkets, and local vendors. This system helps users track inventory in real-time, manage stock levels, and receive low-stock alerts to avoid shortages or overstocking.
items.title: shikha04-glitch/Shikha_CSE3_InStock: InStock is a lightweight and efficient web-based inventory management application designed for small and medium businesses, retail stores, supermarkets, and local vendors. This system helps users track inventory in real-time, manage stock levels, and receive low-stock alerts to avoid shortages or overstocking.

items.content_html: A versatile UI component library with built-in support for both dark and light modes. Users can easily customize components globally or locally, following a lightweight CSS framework aligned with HTML standards. It also provides multiple themes and a user-friendly color scheme generator.
items.title: ioak-io/basicui: A versatile UI component library with built-in support for both dark and light modes. Users can easily customize components globally or locally, following a lightweight CSS framework aligned with HTML standards. It also provides multiple themes and a user-friendly color scheme generator.
